data.title: Irfan Mensur
data.meta_description:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia  

  Irfan Mensur (born: Irfan KuriÄ‡), (Born 19 January 1952) is a Serbian theatre, television and film actor.  He is living and playing roles in Serbia for 30 years. He is married for the 2nd time to Serbian actress Srna Lango. The couple live in Belgrade and have two sons.  During 2000s (decade) couple took one of the main roles in Serbian TV serial Jelena f...
